title: Open your Scars
tags: how to unlock open your scars
content:
very reverent. It must have known you when you were still in one piece. See? You are worse than everyone else. Filthy hierophant of the broken and damned. And apparently good at playing with tentacles. The illithid tide can be dominated by you.
